00010 TWFDBankReader::TWFDBankReader()
00011 {
00012   cerr << "TWFDBankReader: Error! Do not use default constructor." << endl;
00013   exit(1);

00016 TWFDBankReader::TWFDBankReader(Int_t dbc, 
00017                                Int_t personality, 
00018                                string bankname)
00019   : fDBC(dbc), fPersonality(personality), fBankName(bankname),
00020     fBankPtr(NULL), fEventPtr(NULL), fSize(0), fNRequestedWords(0),

00031 inline Int_t TWFDBankReader::GetBlockLength_Words() { return 2*fDBC + 2; }
00032 
00034 inline Int_t TWFDBankReader::GetNBlockSamples() { return 8*fDBC; }

00044 
00045 void TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent(EVENT_HEADER* pheader, void *pevent)
00046 {
00047   ClearEvent(); // reset everything to zero at the beginning of each event
00048   fEventPtr = pevent;
00049 
00050   if(fPersonality != 2) { //MuCap mode is 2
00051     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error! WFD personalities other"
00052          << " than 2 (MuCap mode) have not been implemented. Skipping bank:\n"
00053          << "\t" << fBankName
00054          << endl;
00055     fIsOK = false;
00056     return;
00057   }
00058   fSize = bk_locate(fEventPtr, fBankName.c_str(), &fBankPtr);
00059   if(fBankPtr == NULL) {
00060     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error! Bank not found:"
00061          << "\t" << fBankName
00062          << endl;
00063     fIsOK = false;
00064     return;
00065   }
00066 
00067   //Read status words
00068   if(fSize < 3) { // There are 3 status words
00069     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error? Bank size < 3 words"
00070          << "\tfor bank: " << fBankName
00071          << endl;
00072     fIsOK = false; return; 
00073   }
00074   fNRequestedWords = Int_t(fBankPtr[0]); // unsigned to signed cast.
00075   fNReceivedWords = Int_t(fBankPtr[1]);
00076   fStatus = Int_t(fBankPtr[2]);
00077 
00078   if( !CheckStatus() ) return; // CheckStatus returns false if bank is corrupt
00079 
00080   fNBlocks = (fSize-4) / GetBlockLength_Words();
00081 
00082   if( !ReadIslandsLoop() ) return; // ReadIslandsLoop returns false on failure
00083 
00084   //And we're done!
00085 }
00086 
00090 Bool_t TWFDBankReader::CheckStatus()
00091 {
00092   if( fNRequestedWords == 0 ) { 
00093     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error? WFD Requested words = 0"
00094          << "\tfor bank: " << fBankName << "\n"
00095          << "\tSkipping bank."
00096          << endl;
00097     fIsOK = false; return false; 
00098   }
00099   if( fNRequestedWords >= 0x00100000 ) { 
00100     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error? WFD Requested words "
00101          << " > 0x00100000."
00102          << "\tfor bank: " << fBankName << "\n"
00103          << "\tSkipping bank."
00104          << endl;
00105     fIsOK = false; return false; 
00106   }
00107   if( fNRequestedWords != fNReceivedWords || fStatus!=0 ) {
00108     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error! WFD Requested words != "
00109          << "WFD received words for bank: " << fBankName << "\n"
00110          << "Requested: " << fNRequestedWords << " Received: " 
00111          << fNReceivedWords << " Status: " << fStatus << "\n"
00112          << "\tSkipping bank."
00113          << endl;
00114     fIsOK = false; return false;
00115   }
00116   // Check that the size of the bank is a multiple of the block size
00117   // (plus 4 status words).
00118   if( (fSize-4) % GetBlockLength_Words() !=0 ) { 
00119     cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ProcessEvent() Error! Bank size ("
00120          << fSize-4 << ") is not a multiple "
00121          << "of WFD block length (" << GetBlockLength_Words() << ") "
00122          << "\tfor bank: " << fBankName << "\n"
00123          << "\tSkipping bank."
00124          << endl;
00125     fIsOK=false; return false; 
00126   }
00127   return true;
00128 }
00129 
00133 Bool_t TWFDBankReader::ReadIslandsLoop()
00134 {
00135   //pointer to beginning of wfd block data
00136   DWORD* pDataPtr = fBankPtr+3;
00137   int nBlocksRead = 0; 
00138   int blockoffset = 0; // offset to pDataPtr for the current block
00139   int blocktime = 0; // time of current block
00140   int conttime = -1; // GetNBlockSamples after the last island's time
00141   while( nBlocksRead<fNBlocks ){
00142     // offset for pDataPtr
00143     blockoffset = nBlocksRead*GetBlockLength_Words();
00144     // time is at the end of the adc samples
00145     blocktime = pDataPtr[blockoffset+GetBlockLength_Words()-1] & 0xEFFFFFFF;
00146     // conttime is the time of a potential continuation island
00147     conttime = fData.empty() ? -1 : fData.back().fTime+fData.back().fADC.size();
00148     // New island for first guy or if it's a new trigger
00149     if(nBlocksRead==0 || blocktime > conttime) { 
00150       fData.push_back( TWFDRawIsland() ); // make a new island
00151       fData.back().fTime = blocktime;     // set the new island's time
00152     } else if( blocktime < conttime ){ 
00153         cerr << "TWFDBankReader::ReadIslandsLoop() Error! Block has time: "
00154              << blocktime << " which is less than " << fData.back().fADC.size()
00155              << " clock ticks after the last block at " 
00156              << fData.back().fTime << "\n"
00157              << "Skipping Bank " << fBankName
00158              << endl;
00159         fIsOK=false; return false;
00160     } // Otherwise, it must be a continuation, so don't append to fData
00161     
00162     // At this point, the last island in fData is the one we should add too.
00163     std::vector<UChar_t>& rVec = fData.back().fADC; // local reference
00164     // Set a 1-byte pointer at the beginning of the new block's samples
00165     UChar_t* adc = (UChar_t*)&pDataPtr[blockoffset];
00166     for(int iadc=0; iadc<GetNBlockSamples(); iadc++) {
00167       /* WFD banks store samples non-sequentially. The samples within
00168        * each word are reversed:
00169        *       |DWORD  |DWORD  |DWORD
00170        * Bank: |3|2|1|0|7|6|5|4|11|10|...
00171        *
00172        * where |0| is the first sample, |1| is the second, etc.
00173        * the function (3-iadc%4) + 4*(iadc/4) reproduces this encoding.
00174        */ 
00175       rVec.push_back( adc[ (3-iadc%4) + 4*(iadc/4) ] );
00176       /* cout << "Set sample " << rVec.size() << " to "
00177            << "adc[" << (3-iadc%4) + 4*(iadc/4) << "] = " 
00178            << int(adc[ (3-iadc%4) + 4*(iadc/4) ])
00179            << endl; */ // In case you want to look at what's happening
00180     }
00181 
00182     // update loop variable
00183     nBlocksRead++;
00184   } // end while
00185 }
00186 
00191 void TWFDBankReader::ClearEvent()
00192 {
00193   fData.clear();
00194   fSize = 0;
00195   fBankPtr = NULL;
00196   fEventPtr = NULL;
00197   fNRequestedWords = 0;
00198   fNReceivedWords = 0;
00199   fStatus = 0;
00200   fIsOK = true;
00201   fNBlocks = 0;
00202 }
